task.title: Closing and Posting the Batch
task.abstract: Successfully entering receipts into a batch will initiate a popup window prompting the user to close the batch.

step.cmd: Click the Close Batch button in the popup window; the Batch record displays with the Is Closed checkbox enabled and the Closed Date field autopopulated.
step.info: No transactions are created at this time.

step.cmd: In the Summary section, ensure that the Expected Count and Expected Amount match the Actual Count and Actual Amount.
View the complete list of receipts entered in the Receipts related list.
On the Batch record, click Edit and select the Is Posted checkbox to post the batch.
Click the Save button to create the transactions for the receipts entered via the Batch Receipt Entry page.
step.info: No transaction is created in the event a previously posted receipt is in the batch at the time of posting.

step.cmd: Click the Enter Receipts button on the Batch record.
step.info: Adding any additional receipts to the batch via the Batch Receipt Entry page will not work after the batch is closed.
